author: Warhammer
description:
Ready to bring your Drukhari to life with some killer colour schemes? In this video, Dan will be covering nine distinct Kabal paint schemes to help you style your army with deadly flair. 
Whether you're new to painting or a seasoned hobbyist, there’s something here to inspire your next project from the dark heart of Commorragh.

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Black Heart

Base:
Incubi Darkness

Shade:
Coelia Greenshade

Layer:
Kabalite Green
Sybarite Green

Baleful Gaze

Base:
Caliban Green

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Layer:
Warpstone Glow
Moot Green

Dying Sun

Base:
Retributor Armour
Mephiston Red
Kantor Blue

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Layer:
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Liberator Gold
Hoeth Blue

Poisoned Tongue

Base:
Kantor Blue

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Layer:
Alaitoc Blue
Hoeth Blue

Broken Sigil

Base:
Balthasar Gold

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Layer:
Brass Scorpion
Fenrisian Grey
Hoeth Blue
Ulthuan Grey

Obsidian Rose

Base:
Abaddon Black
Mephiston Red

Shade:
Nuln Oil

Layer:
Dark Reaper
Evil Sunz
title: 9 Wickedly Sinister Drukhari Kabals | Warhammer 40,000
